on nutrition is both through increasing resources (income), and, for conditional programmes, 
enhancing use of services such as immunization and education. The impact on nutritional status 
of children is potentially both through maternal nutrition and hence intra-uterine growth and 
development, and through infant and young child feeding, care, and use of health services.
